definition: a painful muscle spasm especially in the neck or back (`rick' and `wrick' are British), to twist a body part into a strained position
details:
noun
- a painful muscle spasm especially in the neck or back (`rick' and `wrick' are British)
= synonyms: kink
verb
- to twist a body part into a strained position
= example: to twist a body part into a strained position
